src:
IFSC ACC 2019 Jadi Ajang Uji Kemampuan Atlet Panjat Tebing Indonesia
07 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Anggi Tiar


IFSC ACC 2019 Jadi Ajang Uji Kemampuan Atlet Panjat Tebing Indonesia

KBRN, Bogor: Kejuaraan Panjat Tebing bertajuk IFSC ACC Asian Championship 2019 mulai digelar Rabu (6/11/2019) hingga hari Minggu (10/11/2019) mendatang di Pakansari, Cibinong, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat. Event bergengsi ini terselenggara berkat kerja sama Federasi Panjat Tebing Indonesia (FPTI), Supersport Sensation International (SSS) dan Pemerintah Kabupaten Bogor.Kompetisi internasional panjat tebing ini adalah event tahunan yang diselenggarakan dibawah International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC) dan FPTI. Ajang ini diikuti oleh 299 peserta dari 14 negara. CEO SSS, Azwan Karim mengatakan bahwa persiapan panitia pelaksana (Panpel) untuk menggelar event ini sudah sangat baik dan matang. Ia pun berharap ajang ini tidak hanya sukses sebagai penyelenggaran, namun juga atlet Indonesia dapat berprestasi. "Cabor Panjat tebing memiliki potensi untuk berprestasi di ajang internasional. Saatnya atlet Indonesia membuktikannya di ajang ini. Karena kami berharap team Indonesia kembali mengharumkan nama bangsa di ajang Olimpiade Tokyo tahun 2020 mendatang," kata Azwan Karim di lokasi kejuaraan, Rabu (6/11/2019) kemarin malam. Ketua Umum FPTI Faisol Riza mengatakan bahwa kegiatan ini digelar untuk mencari bibit-bibit baru atlet panjat tebing. Selama ini cabor tersebut sangat bisa diandalkan di event dunia. "Kira-kira ada yang menarik mengapa event ini digelar. Olah raga panjat tebing merupakan salah satu cabor, di mana Indonesia sangat berprestasi di level dunia, dan beberapa atlet Indonesia merupakan juara dunia di kategori Speed yaitu Puji Lestari, Alfian M. Fajri dan Aries Susanti," ujar Faisol.Tiga kategori yang dipertandingkan yakni speed, lead dan boulder. Selama lima hari event ini dimulai dari pukul 08.00 WIB hingga selesai. Tercatat atlet  Aries Susanti Rahayu yang bulan lalu baru saja memecahkan rekor dunia Putri Speed di kompetisi world cup di Xiamen, China. Ia menjadi Wanita pertama di dunia yang berhasil membukukan rekor dengan waktu di bawah 7 detik, yaitu 6,995. Pada event ini, juga akan dihadiri oleh pemegang rekor dunia speed putra dari Iran, yakni Reza Alipour Shenazandifar. Lanjut Faisol, event ini merupakan bagian dari pembinaan jangka panjang yang sedang dilakukan FPTI. Targetnya adalah mengantarkan Indonesia berprestasi di Olimpiade 2020 dan 2024."Jenjang kejuaraan ini merupakan langkah strategis bagi atlet Indonesia kedepan. Selain sebagai ajang mengasah mental bertanding, ajang ini juga menjadi barometer kemampuan atlet Indonesia di tingkat Asian," tukas Faisol.Pada acara opening seremony yang akan digelar pada Rabu (6/11/2019) malam dihadiri oleh Sesmenpora Gatot S Dewa Broto, Menpar Wishnutama, dan Bupati Kabupaten Bogor Ade Munawaroh Yasin. Opening seremony digelar di GOR Laga Satria, Pakansari, Kabupaten Bogor. (Foto: Antara)
text:
IFSC ACC 2019 Becomes a Test Facility for Indonesian Rock Climbing Athletes
Nov 7 2019, 08:30 by Anggi Tiar


IFSC ACC 2019 Becomes a Test Facility for Indonesian Rock Climbing Athletes

KBRN, Bogor: The Rock Climbing Championship titled IFSC ACC Asian Championship 2019 starts on Wednesday (11/06/2019) until next Sunday (11/10/2019) in Pakansari, Cibinong, Bogor Regency, West Java. This prestigious event was held thanks to the cooperation of the Indonesian Rock Climbing Federation (FPTI), Supersport Sensation International (SSS) and the Bogor Regency Government. This international rock climbing competition is an annual event held under the International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC) and FPTI. This event was attended by 299 participants from 14 countries. SSS CEO, Azwan Karim said that the preparation of the organizing committee (Panpel) to hold this event was very good and mature. He also hopes that this event will not only be a success but also Indonesian athletes can excel. "Rock Climbing Sports has the potential to excel in international events. It is time for Indonesian athletes to prove it in this event. Because we hope that the Indonesian team will reignite the nation's name in the upcoming 2020 Tokyo Olympics," Azwan Karim said at the championship location, Wednesday (6/11) / 2019) last night. FPTI Chairperson Faisol Riza said that this activity was held to look for new seeds for rock climbing athletes. During this time the sport is very reliable at world events. "I think there is something interesting why this event was held. Rock climbing is one of the sports, where Indonesia is very accomplished at the world level, and some Indonesian athletes are world champions in the Speed category, namely Praise Lestari, Alfian M. Fajri and Aries Susanti, "said Faisol. Three categories were competed namely speed, lead and boulder. For five days the event began at 08.00 WIB until finished. Noted athlete Aries Susanti Rahayu, who just broke Putri Speed's world record last month in the world cup competition in Xiamen, China. She became the first woman in the world to manage a record in under 7 seconds, which is 6.995. In this event, it will also be attended by the holder of the world speed record for men from Iran, namely Reza Alipour Shenazandifar. Faisol continued, this event was part of the long-term coaching that was being carried out by FPTI. The target is to deliver Indonesia to excel in the 2020 and 2024 Olympics. "This championship level is a strategic step for Indonesian athletes going forward. Aside from being a place to sharpen the mentality of competition, this event also serves as a barometer of the ability of Indonesian athletes at the Asian level," said Faisol. which will be held on Wednesday (6/11/2019) night was attended by Sesmenpora Gatot S Dewa Broto, Menpar Wishnutama, and the Regent of Bogor Regency Ade Munawaroh Yasin. The opening ceremony was held at GOR Laga Satria, Pakansari, Bogor Regency. (Photo: Antara)
